statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE stock_quantity > 50;
SELECT product_name, location_id FROM inventory_tracking WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity, location_id FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE stock_quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity, location_id FROM inventory_tracking WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_tracking WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' AND stock_quantity < 20;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE location_id = 1 AND stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM stock_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'IN' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity < 50
SELECT product_name, quantity_changed FROM inventory JOIN stock_transactions ON inventory.product_id = stock_transactions.product_id WHERE stock_transactions.transaction_type = 'sale'

SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity_changed) AS total_sales FROM inventory JOIN stock_transactions ON inventory.product_id = stock_transactions.product_id WHERE stock_transactions.transaction_type = 'sale' GROUP BY product_name

SELECT product_name, transaction_date FROM inventory JOIN stock_transactions ON inventory.product_id = stock_transactions.product_id WHERE stock_transactions.transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT location, current_quantity FROM stock ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT sale_date, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales_amount FROM sales GROUP BY sale_date ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT location, current_quantity, last_update FROM stock WHERE location LIKE 'Ware%' ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity_sold, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN stock ON inventory.id = stock.product_id WHERE inventory.quantity >= stock.current_quantity ORDER BY stock.current_quantity ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, last_update FROM inventory LEFT JOIN stock ON inventory.id = stock.product_id WHERE stock.current_quantity IS NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, location FROM warehouses ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT event_time, event_type, warehouse_id FROM stock_history WHERE event_type = 'Incoming' ORDER BY event_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity ASC;
SELECT products.name, products.price, warehouses.location FROM products INNER JOIN warehouses ON products.id = warehouses.id ORDER BY products.name ASC, warehouses.location DESC;

SELECT products.name, stock_history.event_time FROM products LEFT JOIN stock_history ON products.id = stock_history.product_id WHERE stock_history.event_type='restock' ORDER BY stock_history.event_time DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_after - quantity_before) AS total_sales FROM stock_history WHERE event_type='sale' GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 0 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
